title: Enhance expanded now playing view
description:
Backlog: none

Goal:
- Expand the now playing sheet with richer metadata and navigation controls.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Higher-res album art is used when available.
- [ ] Artist, album, and track names are displayed.
- [ ] Back button is present.
- [ ] Forward button advances playback.

title: Add skip-to-next button in collapsed view
description:
Backlog: none

Goal:
- Add a track-oriented skip-to-next control in the collapsed playback bar view.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Collapsed playback bar shows a next-track button.
- [ ] Button triggers playback of the next track when available.

title: Add album-wide progress bar
description:
Backlog: backlog/tasks/task-93 - Add-album-wide-progress-bar.md

Goal:
- Show an album-wide progress indicator across tracks in the playback UI.

Notes:
- Album progress = sum played time across album tracks / total album duration.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Album-wide progress bar appears for album playback.
- [ ] Progress updates smoothly as tracks advance.
- [ ] Progress resets when album changes.

title: Model album progress aggregation
description: Compute album progress as total album duration vs. played time (previous tracks + current track progress). Update on track change and playback time updates.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Album progress percent is correct for initial track.
- [ ] Album progress percent advances with playback time.
- [ ] Album progress percent jumps when track changes.

title: Add album progress bar UI
description: Add an album-wide progress bar to the playback UI that is visible for album playback and hides for non-album queues.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Progress bar renders in playback UI for album queue.
- [ ] Progress bar uses existing progress styling if available.

title: Wire updates and tests for album progress
description: Wire album progress updates to playback state and add/update tests if coverage exists for playback progress.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Album progress updates during playback.
- [ ] Progress resets when album changes.

title: Show album + track in collapsed view
description:
Backlog: none

Goal:
- Display the track title after the album name in the collapsed playback bar when space permits.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Album title appears before track title in collapsed view for album playback.
